247.description: Configure the bot to stay in the voice channel.

options.add: The DJ role you want to add.
options.remove: The DJ role you want to remove.

options.reset: Reset the language to the default language.
options.language: The language you want to set.

prefix.description: Displays or sets the bot's prefix.

options.reset: Resets the prefix to the default one.
options.prefix: The prefix you want to set.

options.reset: Reset the theme to the default.
options.theme: The theme to set (classic, modern, or modernpro).

options.pitch: The number you want to set the pitch to (between 0.5 and 5).

rate.description: Changes the rate of the song.

options.rate: The number you want to set the rate to (between 0.5 and 5).

speed.description: Changes the speed of the song.

options.speed: The speed you want to set (between 0.5 and 5).

clusters.description: Displays information about the shard clusters.

options.command: The command you want information about.

options.role: Choose a role to get its information.

support.description: Get the invite link for the support server.

grab.description: Gets the currently playing song in your DMs.

loop.description: Loop the current song or the queue.

lyrics.description: Gets the lyrics of the currently playing song or a specified song.

options.song: The name of the song you want to search the lyrics for.

play.description: Play a song from YouTube, Spotify, or http.

options.song: The song you want to play.

playnext.description: Add the song to play next in the queue.

options.song: The song you want to play.

remove.description: Removes a song from the queue.

options.song: The number of the song you want to remove.
The song you want to search for.

seek.description: Seeks to a specific time in the song.

options.duration: The duration you want to seek to.

skipto.description: Skips to a specific song in the queue.

options.number: The number of the song you want to skip to.

stop.description: Stops the music and clears the queue.

options.number: The volume you want to set.

addsong.description: Adds a song to the playlist.

options.playlist: The playlist you want to add to.
options.song: The song you want to add.

options.playlist: The playlist you want to delete.

list.description: Gets all playlists from the user.

options.user: The user whose playlists you want to retrieve.

options.playlist: The playlist you want to load.

removesong.description: Removes a song from the playlist.

options.playlist: The playlist you want to remove from.
options.song: The song you want to remove.

steal.description: Steals a playlist from another user and adds it to your playlists.

options.playlist: The playlist you want to steal.
options.user: The user you want to steal the playlist from.
